transcripts.speaker: Speaker 2
transcripts.text: Labeling him a scientific charlatan and a corrupter of the youth and Kronecker used to be Cantor's teacher. Cantor dreamed of joining him at the University of Berlin, but all his applications were mysteriously denied. So. Cantor.

transcripts.speaker: Speaker 2
transcripts.text: Took the rejection personally. In 1884, he wrote 52 letters to a friend, and every one of them.
